Source.Name: perl-list-allutils
Source.Summary: List::AllUtils - Combines List::Util, List::SomeUtils and List::UtilsBy in one bite-sized package
Source.Description: Are you sick of trying to remember whether a particular helper is defined in List::Util, List::SomeUtils or List::UtilsBy? I sure am. Now you don't have to remember. This module will export all of the functions that either of those three modules defines.

Package.Name: perl-list-allutils
